channel.title: ReflectScape BETA 639 | 24/7 Online | BRAND NEW SERVER
channel.description:
[url=http://reflectscape.com/]http://reflectscape.com/[/url]
Looking for a brand new server to play on?! If you answered that question with a "yes", come and take a look at ReflectScape!
[B]Some of our servers' features:[/B] - Dementhium based. - Running on VPS (24/7 online) - 20+ fully working bosses. - 15+ Training spots. - All working specs. - Well balanced exp rate. - Fully automated Donation system. - Working duel arena. - 23 Trainable skills. (working on the rest as we speak) - Shops south of home. - Teleporter at home who can take you anwhere you need. - Much more!
[B]What does the "BETA" mean?[/B] Since we are a brand new server. There might be a few bugs, we decided to put the server online for people to play on our server while we still improve lots of things.
[B]What are we looking for?[/B] We are currently looking for active players, who enjoy the good old 2011 RSPS. :)
[B]Download our client on our website:[/B] [url=http://reflectscape.com/]http://reflectscape.com/[/url]
[img]http://i57.tinypic.com/ege07q.jpg[/img] [img]http://i62.tinypic.com/wjc594.jpg[/img] [img]http://i59.tinypic.com/33ma4iv.jpg[/img] [img]http://i57.tinypic.com/2u9hnom.jpg[/img] [img]http://i58.tinypic.com/nq1e8z.jpg[/img]
[url=http://reflectscape.com/]http://reflectscape.com/[/url]
